title: FST206 Eddie Collins miscut oddities (one two names, one no name)
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FST206 Eddie Collins miscut oddities (one two names, one no name)
posts.post_content:
Hi all,
Here we have a pair of real oddball Eddie Collins T206 cards.  The SGC 30 has a full name at top and 2/3rds name at the bottom, cut off righ below the lines in the A's.  This card is huge! (sorry for the crappy scan on the holder, surface wear is not as bad as it looks in the scan and the background is much richer)

The other is a real odd one.  I am pretty sure it is impossible to print a T206 without the name, but the amount of white at the bottom of this card is crazy.  As you can see on the back, there was lots of room for the factory.  Most likely just a very old trim job, but the edges all have the same coloring and all that good stuff.  I bought it just becase it wasn't like anything I had seen before.

These cards sell as a pair.  Emails come first over posts.  I do have to run out to the dentist this morning if you don't hear back from me right away.  The first to commit to buy takes the odd couple to the house.

Paypal is prefered $650 delivered for the pair.
Thanks,
Bob
upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com
